casebody.data:
Third Department,

August, 1952.

(August 6, 1952.) In the Matter of Emanuel Petrakakis, Respondent, against John F. O’Connell et al., Constituting the State Liquor Authority, Appellants.

Appeal from an order of the Supreme Court, Special Term, Albany County, which annulled a determination of the State Liquor Authority. Upon the record before us we are of the opinion that the determination of the State Liquor Authority was arbitrary and capricious and the order of the Special Term should be affirmed. Order of the Special Term unanimously affirmed, with $50 costs and disbursements. Present — Foster, P. J., Heffernan, Brewster, Bergan and Coon, JJ.
